title: Modern Mangalsutra Two-Layer Necklace with Diamond Accents
features: A delicate two-layered mangalsutra necklace featuring a rose gold plated chain adorned with traditional black crystal beads ('nalla pusalu'). The lower layer showcases a central floral pendant studded with sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds. The upper layer features a single CZ diamond accent.
description: This elegant mangalsutra necklace offers a modern twist on a traditional symbol of marriage. The rose gold and diamond accents add a touch of sophistication, making it suitable for everyday wear while still honoring cultural heritage. Lightweight and comfortable, this piece is perfect for the contemporary woman.
